name: Oven-Baked Asian Omelet
ingredients: 8 ounces fresh or canned bean sprouts, rinsed and drained well

instructions.en: Beat the eggs with the soy sauce and sesame oil. Stir in the chopped green onions.
In a large skillet, sauté the mushrooms in oil until tender.
Add the shrimp and bean sprouts; cook on high heat long enough to evaporate any excess liquid, stirring constantly.
Season with garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Spread the mushroom mixture in a greased 10-inch quiche pan or pie plate.
Pour the egg mixture over the mushrooms.
Bake at 425°F for 15-17 minutes until set.

notes: Freezing is not recommended for this dish. The recipe makes 6-8 servings, depending on portion size.
